attributes.action: Right to Travel to EU Countries without Test or Quarantine with Proof of Vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Current Restrictions Breach Human Rights and Restrict Normal Life Conditions.
attributes.background: Remove Travel Restrictions for UK Passport Holders with Two Vaccine Injections without the need for Quarantine or PCR Test.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Requirements to travel to other countries are set by their national Governments and not the UK Government and Parliament.
